pages.text: Getting from A to B is tedious. Your travel time only seems to go up, especially with $(l:resources/geodes)Geodes$(/l) scattered across the land as they are. To solve this issue, you designed the Seven League Boots, making you much more mobile than before.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: Increases both Movement Speed and Step Height.

pages.title: Power
pages.text: The Power enchantment increases the movement speed bonus further.
